name: Statewide
0:
”Alexa, Open Statewide”
”How do I join?”
”Are you open today?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: statewide
des:
Statewide can save you time by answering many questions at your convenience. To do so, please: 

1. Enable the Statewide skill by saying "Alexa, enable the Statewide skill" or do so in the skill section of the Alexa app.

2. Enjoy having questions answered instantly. Some items we can help with include:

"...where are you located?”
"...what’s your phone number?” 
"...are you open?”
"...how can I join?”
"...what are your auto loan rates?"
"...I lost my card."

We are constantly working to better our member's lives. If you have any suggestions on how we can improve, please do so by going to https://www.statewidefcu.org/contact-us/ and completing our contact form.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
